headline: Ukraine Reviews Claim That Allies of President Were Spying on Envoy
abstract: Newly released documents suggest that Ms. Yovanovitch was being watched in Kyiv while she was the American ambassador there.
lead_paragraph: MOSCOW â€” Ukraine has opened a criminal investigation into allies of President Trump, following reports that they had the United States ambassador under surveillance while she was stationed in Kyiv, the Ukrainian government said on Thursday.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
